text:
Administrative Arrangements (Removal of Inconsistency) Order 2018

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 5(2) of the Administrative Arrangements Act 1990 .

18 June 2018

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

WILLIAM E. F. HODGMAN

Premier

PART 1 - Preliminary

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Administrative Arrangements (Removal of Inconsistency) Order 2018 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2018.

PART 2 - Community Protection (Offender Reporting) Act 2005 Amended

3.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Community Protection (Offender Reporting) Act 2005 .

4.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Community Protection (Offender Reporting) Act 2005 .

PART 3 - Community Protection (Offender Reporting) Regulations 2016 Amended

5.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Community Protection (Offender Reporting) Regulations 2016 .

6.
    The amendments effected by this Part have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Community Protection (Offender Reporting) Regulations 2016 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 27 June 2018
